situation: G threw her books on the floor when she found out PE was canceled due to rain, scattering papers everywhere.
action: The teacher's aide reprimanded G for her behavior and made her pick up her own books without helping or explaining the situation.
effect: G felt frustrated and misunderstood, which led to her being disengaged for the rest of the school day. Her enthusiasm for PE waned, impacting future participation.
topic: Routine Disruptions - Changes in daily schedule or expected activities
